reviewText: My copy was flawed.  They gave me another copy, and viewed it first to make sure that it wasn't flawed.  That is above and beyond expectations.  They treated me very well

You can buy this film (which is not Brando's best)  from Amaazon/France for Euros 12.99. It is the original version with French subtitles. Napoleon being French, it makes more sense to buy this version than the one for US$ 299 with chinese subtitles....
